StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_DeleteMul.pleSchools]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
as
declare @dod varchar(20), @login varchar(15)
declare schools cursor for
select dod_code from arms..schools_deleted
open schools
fetch schools into @dod
set @login = 'powersvr'
while (@@fetch_status = 0) begin
if exists (select 1 from high_school where dod_code = @dod)
begin update high_school set deleted = 'Y', user_login = @login, update_date = getdate() where dod_code = @dod
end
else print @dod + ' is not a valid DOD Code'
fetch schools into @dod
end
close schools deallocate schools
